name: sdlc-agents
description: SDLC Agents - FastAPI Backend for Software Development Lifecycle Management

scripts.dev: cd apps/api && make run HOST=0.0.0.0 PORT=8000 RELOAD=true
scripts.dev:api: cd apps/api && make run HOST=0.0.0.0 PORT=8000 RELOAD=true
scripts.setup: echo 'SDLC Agents setup complete. Run pnpm dev to start the API server.'
